alert.note: Alert for De Kalb (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 06 at 2:31PM CDT until May 06 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN SMITH...NORTHWESTERN DE KALB...SOUTHEASTERN SUMNER AND WILSON COUNTIES... At 230 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hendersonville to near Watertown, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gallatin, Lebanon, Hendersonville, Mount Juliet, Watertown, Belinda City, Alexandria, Cedars Of Lebanon State Park, Green Hill, Tuckers Crossroads, Cottontown and Gladeville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 224 and 252. Interstate 840 between mile markers 67 and 76. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
